page.title: 15ANNUAL EVENT WARWICK BRIDGE
page.content: {THE PRAM RACE} Quite a few people came to watch this event.It is held once a year at Easter and as well as the pram race where people dress up in silly costumes prizes are given for the best decorated egg.Last year a butterfy egg was first and a spaceman was second and Worzel Gumagge was third.An ice cream van,a hot dog stall and a jazz band who came on a lorry entertained the crowd and the pub gave out free meals all day.There is a play ground so the children can have a good time while the adults have a drink.Money is raised for charity.
